CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Nova Industries?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {below} Nova Industries in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {above} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Solutions relative to Nova Industries?
SRP.A: Luminara Solutions is {below} Nova Industries in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Industries}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's minimum Patent Applications is in {2003}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Solutions's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Solutions's maximum Patent Applications is in {2005}.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2002, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1998 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2000 and 2002 was {lower} than between 1998 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2004, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1998 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2001 and 2004 was {lower} than between 1998 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2009, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2002 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2000 and 2009 was {lower} than between 2002 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2000, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1999 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1995 and 2000 was {lower} than between 1999 and 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Dynamics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara Solutions and Echo Dynamics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara Solutions and Echo Dynamics first exchanged leading positions in {2003}.
